subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Leading by 3-2 in the best-of-seven series, the Dallas Mavericks have two chances to close out the Phoenix Suns and win the N.B.A. Western Conference title.
snippet: Leading by 3-2 in the best-of-seven series, the Dallas Mavericks have two chances to close out the Phoenix Suns and win the N.B.A. Western Conference title.
